name: Quid
description: JWT server providing Refresh/Access tokens supporting HMAC, RSA, ECDSA and EdDSA

QUID_KEY.description: A secret key for the Quid server

DB_HOST.description: The network location of the Postgres server

DB_PORT.description: The TCP port to send the requests to the Postgres server

DB_NAME.description: The database name of the Quid server

DB_URL.description: The info to connect to the Postgres server

WWW_DIR.description: Folder of the web static files

PORT.description: Listening port of the Quid server
